Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command used to ban someone.

Reason.label: Reason
Reason.tooltip: The reason why someone was banned. (Format: '[username] was banned for...')

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: What group of people (and above) are able to use the command

Info.label: Info
Info.tooltip: This should only be used if you are using user_specific permissions.

Volume.label: Volume
Volume.tooltip: Sets the volume for the sound effect.

File.label: SFX file (Include .mp3)
File.tooltip: The sound effect to be played when banning someone.

SFX Directory.label: Open the SFX directory
SFX Directory.tooltip: Opens the SFX directory so you can add your own sound effects.
